title: Here Drive voice doesn't trigger SMTC property changed event on WP8.1
body: When playing with BackgroundAudio on WP8.1 I've notcied that when Here Drive plays drive command (example 'turn left in 100 meters'), the subscribed event to SMTC.PropertyChanged is not fired. As I think it should at least change SoundLevel to Low. In some apps this may be considered as a bug.

comments.body: After some more tests - it shouldn't change to SoundLevel.Low as it's the 'normal' state of sound level, it should be SoundLevel.Muted.
